features: The Button on the Goose neck -- Unlike the magnifying lamps on the market which the switch on the power-cord, conveniently operates the button to adjust 5 color modes and stepless dimming brightness.

Upgraded Magnifying Light -- Compared to the single color mode magnifying desk lamp on the market, we have upgraded it to 5 color modes, meets your different usage needs. Uniform ring lighting brightness up to 1500 lumens, combined with clear magnifying glass, can effectively reduce visual fatigue for workers who focus on close work.

Upgraded 2-in-1 design -- Exclusive patented technology, new clip design to improve the defects of clips on the market, more firm and stable mounted to the desktop, larger clip-distance for different workbenches. Protective pads are added on both sides of the clip to prevent damage to the table.

Real Glass Magnifier -- In order to take into account the stability and practicability of the magnifying desk lamp (appropriate magnification and focal length), after repeated testing and research, the 5X( 8 diopter )-3.75 inch real glass (5.2in lens) magnifier was finally determined, especially suitable for crafts, reading, miniature painting, read, sewing, hobbies, mini tasks, jewelry, soldering, beading, fly tying, etc.

A Good Gift Idea for Seniors -- A very practical and considerate gift for seniors or those who need vision aids such as low vision or macular degeneration, visually impaired. Eyes and hands free to enjoy the life. For any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact us for assistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good little light- versatile. Mounting options are good
reviews.reviewText: So let me say that I cant use the clamp mount with my bench its just a tad too thick , over 2 inches it would need to clear- but the clamp mount feels and looks quite sturdy- But also the REACH of this small lamp means if you DO clip it youll be working pretty dang close to the edge of your benchlike not much more than a foot depending on how high up you need to work - So the included pedestal base is nice and its what I am using. Now- its got some good weight to it and it does hold up the light but youll want to hold the base while adjusting the bend in the lamp because the neck is nice and stiff and the base will move or tip - thats unavoidable in this case. but its fine once adjusted to stand on its own.On to the item itself. For the price the magnifier is decent. Its quite usable. it is large enough for most work. The magnification is mild so you wont be using this for Ultra fine soldering or something but it is a good augmentation and makes things easier. It could also be used to read fine print effectively if your eyes are getting older and tired or you have a visual disability like my wife does. (Not a joke about my looks but I certainly don't deserve her) The light has multiple color temp modes which can help more than youd think with getting a clear look at something, and a wide range of adjustable brightness. Its plenty bright to function as a nice bright desk lamp for non magnified work. Added bonus is the base is a nice place to put thngs down or neatly store a little pair of helping hands or something since it dished you can put screws or small parts on it and they wont "escape". The cable is USB... so this is easy to power. It comes with the USB to wall adapter (phone charger style) as well of course.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have Tool for Resin Miniature Enthusiasts – TOMSOO Magnifying Glass Exceeds Expectations!
reviews.reviewText: As a hobbyist deeply involved in creating and painting 3D printed resin miniatures, I recently purchased the TOMSOO 5X Magnifying Glass with Light and Clamp, and I am thrilled to share how it has revolutionized my crafting experience.Precision and Clarity:The 5X magnification is perfect for working on the fine details of resin miniatures. It brings the tiniest features into sharp focus, making it so much easier to paint intricate patterns and textures without straining my eyes. The clarity of the lens is impeccable, ensuring that I can see every minute aspect of my models with utmost precision.Lighting Excellence:The stepless dimmable light is a game-changer. With 5 color modes, it provides me with the flexibility to choose the perfect lighting for different stages of my work – from assembling to painting. Whether I need bright light to highlight details or a softer glow to reduce glare on the resin's surface, this magnifying glass delivers. The light evenly illuminates my work area, ensuring no shadows or dark spots interfere with my work.Ease of Use and Versatility:The clamp design is robust and easy to attach to my worktable. It stays firmly in place, providing stability as I work on my miniatures. The flexible arm is another feature I adore; it allows me to adjust the magnifier to any angle, making it comfortable to work for long hours without any neck or back strain.Build Quality and Design:The build quality of this magnifying glass is outstanding. It feels sturdy and well-constructed, assuring me that it will be a long-term companion in my miniature crafting journey. The sleek design not only makes it a functional tool but also adds a professional touch to my workspace.Conclusion:In conclusion, the TOMSOO 5X Magnifying Glass with Light and Clamp is an invaluable asset for anyone into 3D printed resin miniatures. It enhances the overall crafting experience by providing excellent magnification, adjustable lighting, ease of use, and great build quality. This tool has definitely taken my miniature painting and assembly to the next level. I highly recommend it to fellow enthusiasts – it’s a worthwhile investment that significantly improves the precision and enjoyment of our intricate craft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nifty with a battery pack.
reviews.reviewText: This is nice, it has a good weight to it and is detachable from the base. So you can Scooby Doo or up with a ridiculous magnifying glass!This works amazing with a rechargeable USB battery pack, highly recommend getting one as it makes it ultra portable.It's flexible and holds it's position well. Magnifying as expected.Several light modes and slight color variations. This is nice when working with small shiny things.Can't over position it to fall over with the base attached.If you are looking for something like this this works well. Also comes with a edge clamp if you don't plan to move it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, Inexpensive Lamp
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it's a nice lamp with some good features like being able to adjust the color tone and brightness. The inclusion of a base or desk/table mount is also helpful.The only significant complaint I have right now is that the cord is shorter than expected and doesn't provide a lot of reach. It is powered by a USB cord though, so I could either plug it into a battery back or get a USB extension cable to get the extra reach needed.I haven't used the magnifying lens yet, and it could just be my inexperience with it, but it seems a little tough to get a clear focused view on the object you are trying to magnify. You have to hold it in just the right spot or the image is blurred.Lastly, the lamp base will not support the weight of the lens/light if the angle is extended too far out past the base. It seems like it's minor, but I can imagine if I were to accidentally bump the lamp a little bit while working, it might be enough force to cause it to tip over. The table/desk mount option resolves this concern, and certainly just being careful around it should be fine for me.

Bought this for myself just as a light for sewing. I have however found that the magnifying lens works good for locating and pulling the little cat hairs that inevitably find their way onto my diamond paintings. I can not speak to the clamp as I have not used it, but used with the base it is sturdy. Magnifying lens works good. I wish the neck was longer but otherwise a fantastic light!

reviews.reviewTitle: Magnifying glass to rigid for me
reviews.reviewText: Magnifying glass too small for me, not flexible enough for hand sewing, but good strong light.
Great light, very strong magnifier. My only wish is that it had a longer cord.
Only improvement I would make is a rotating head.
Exactly as advertised and just what I needed for small repair jobs with my 76 year old eyes. Works great. Very well constructed and heavier than I thought it would be. Very pleased.
